articles.description: Follow live text, in-play video clips and radio commentary as Australia play South Africa in the Men's Cricket World Cup 2023.
articles.title: World Cup: South Africa bat first after Australia win toss

articles.description: Build-up to Scotland's Euro 2024 qualifier in Spain and England's friendly against Australia on Friday, plus all the latest football news.
articles.title: Euro 2024 qualifying and international build-up

articles.description: The Grand National will be reduced to a maximum of 34 runners from 40 as part of measures designed to improve safety.
articles.title: Grand National field to be cut in safety move

articles.description: The former F1 boss admits failing to declare more than £400m of overseas assets.
articles.title: Bernie Ecclestone pleads guilty to fraud

articles.description: Jockey Frankie Dettori abandons plans to retire later this year and will continue his career in the United States
articles.title: Dettori to postpone retirement for US move

articles.description: Wales full-back Liam Williams and fly-half Dan Biggar are passed fit to face Argentina in Marseille on Saturday.
articles.title: Wales duo fit for World Cup quarter-finals

articles.description: The MOTD Top 10 is back as Gary Lineker, Alan Shearer and Micah Richards discuss the best Premier League front threes.
articles.title: Who had the best front three in Premier League history?

articles.description: Rugby's new global tournament - the women's WXV competition - starts on Friday. How does it work and when are the matches?
articles.title: What is WXV? Rugby's new global tournament explained

articles.description: Uefa president Aleksander Ceferin expresses "profound sorrow" about "the tragic acts of violence" in Israel.
articles.title: Uefa chief expresses 'profound sorrow' to Israel

articles.description: Steve Clarke's Scotland are close to a watershed moment as they prepare to play Spain with a place at Euro 2024 at stake, writes Scott Mullen.
articles.title: 'Scotland on verge of watershed moment in Spain'
